text: Fernand, Count van de Werve, (9 June 1876 - 29 December 1958) was a Belgian nobleman. == Family == He was the son of Léon van de Werve (1851-1920) and Irène Kervyn d'Oud Mooreghem (1857-1938). His uncle was René-Philippe van de Werve. He was married to Countess Blanche de Lichtervelde, daughter of Count Gaston-Auguste of Lichtervelde and Baronness Marguerite Fallon. Children: Fernand van de WERVE de VORSSELAER, geneanet.org, accessed 22 May 2015 * Antoinette van de Werve de Vorsselaer b. 16.12.1911 * Denise van de Werve de Vorsselaer b. 30.01.1913 ** Married: Maxime van de Werve de Schilde * Jacques van de Werve de Vorsselaer b. 01.10.1915 ** Married: Béatrice de Faestraets * Léon van de Werve de Vorsselaer b. 14.10.1919 ==References== Category:1876 births Category:1958 deaths Category:Counts of Belgium Fernand
title: Fernand van de Werve
